name: AVG Monthly Salary Offered
query:
SELECT
    ROUND(AVG(pc.monthly_income)) AS average_income
FROM
    `tabCandidate Details` AS ca
INNER JOIN
    `tabPlacement Child` AS pc ON pc.parent = ca.candidate_id
WHERE
    ca.current_status = 'Placed'
    AND pc.creation >= DATE_ADD(LAST_DAY(DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 2 MONTH)), INTERVAL 1 DAY)
    AND pc.creation < LAST_DAY(DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 MONTH))
